args:
Locating the somnium apples proves an uphill
battle that nearly causes a quarrel between
Ranzal and Luca, but their feelings for the
prince manage to save the day. Unified once
more, the two finally locate the apples and
make good on their most manly of promises.
Argh! Where the heck ARE they?!
I've had it about up to here with\nthis damn fruit chase!
We can't just go back to kicking trees,\nthough. Remember that hornet's nest?
I do NOT want to go through that again.
Yeah, I GET that! But we ain't gonna find\neven a regular apple if we keep wanderin'\naround like a couple'a chumps.
I figured glowing apples would be\nmuch easier to find, honestly.
Maybe yer info was bupkis to begin with?
Wh-what? I'd never lie about this!
Just wondered if ya mighta been mistaken,\nis all. ...So how 'bout it?
I mean, sure, it IS a rumor—but it's one\nI heard from a whole lot of people!
Ah, don't worry about it—I'm just over here\nflappin' my gums.
Maybe we oughta call it a day and think\nup some other present, though.
I won't give up yet—not as long as we're\ndoing this for {player_name}!
I've seen him work his way out of\nsituations far more hopeless than this.
He taught me to never give up—and\na whole lot of other things besides!
Don't you feel the same way, Ranzal?\nWouldn't you do anything for him?
Can you REALLY give up now?!
...Yeah, I suppose we should keep lookin'.
Still, I don't wanna just wander in circles.\nYa got any other clues?

Sorry, no. Like I was saying earlier,
it's an apple that absorbs moonlight,
starts glowing, and is insanely delicious,
but that's about all I have.
Well, if this starts glowing 'cause of\nmoonlight, what happens when the sun...
Aw, hell—that's IT! Also, we're idiots.
C'mon, Luca. If I'm right about this...
Oh my gosh. These taste like someone\ngave happiness stems and a core.
Hey, don't eat 'em all on the way back!\nLeave some for {player_name}!
I will, I will! Honestly, I'm just glad\nwe managed to find some.
I was actually starting to think they\nmight have just been a faerie tale.
I mean, an apple that absorbs moonlight\nsounds crazy when you think about it.
I'm just glad we thought to look for 'em\nat NIGHT as opposed to durin' the day.
We shoulda picked up on that\na whole lot earlier.
Still, I woulda given up if it wasn't\nfor you, Luca. I owe ya one.
I was ready to pack it in,\nbut ya wouldn't let me quit!
Hey, come on. We found these because\nwe worked our butts off TOGETHER!
Here, you really need to try one of these.
I just hope the prince likes 'em.
Oh, he will. I'm sure of it.
Looks like we got a real Valentine's\nsuccess on our hands here!
